subject: Running
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: At 6 feet 1 inch and 165 pounds, Chris Solinsky is bigger than most long-distance runners. He is also the American record holder in the 10,000 meters.
snippet: At 6 feet 1 inch and 165 pounds, Chris Solinsky is bigger than most long-distance runners. He is also the American record holder in the 10,000 meters.
